dct_title_s: Map of Chatham County, N.C. / by Capt. N. A. Ramsey
dct_description_sm: This map was created  by Nathan Alexander Ramsey, confederate captain of Company D of the 61st Regiment. Shows: landowners, churches, foundries, schools, retail stores, cotton and steam mills,  poor houses, coal deposits, creeks, rivers, roads, and the Chatham Railroad. "This map is reproduced from a scanned version of the original map, courtesy of North Carolina Archives."
dct_publisher_sm: New York, N.Y. : Snyder, Black & Sturn, 1870.
Pittsboro, N.C. : Chatham County Historical Association, Inc., 2007
